mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME, BELONG, AUTH, PHONE, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT, REG_USER_NO, CHG_DT, CHG_USER_NO FROM PUSER_INFO ORDER BY USER_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PUSER_INFO ( EMAIL, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, BELONG, PHONE, AUTH, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT )VALUES( #{email}, #{user_name}, PASSWORD(#{password}), #{belong}, #{phone}, 'U', LAST_INSERT_ID(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE PUSER_INFO SET REG_USER_NO = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT USER_NO FROM PUSER_INFO WHERE EMAIL=#{email}) AS s) WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_NAME, AUTH, EMAIL, BELONG FROM PUSER_INFO WHERE EMAIL=#{email} AND PASSWORD = PASSWORD(#{password})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PUSER_INFO WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT PASSWORD FROM PUSER_INFO WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND USER_NAME=#{user_name} AND PHONE=#{phone}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PUSER_INFO WHERE USER_NO IN #{user_no}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, EMAIL, PASSWORD, USER_NAME, BELONG, AUTH, PHONE, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT, REG_USER_NO, CHG_DT, CHG_USER_NO FROM PUSER_INFO WHERE EMAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%') OR USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user_name}, '%')
SELECT USER_NO, EMAIL, USER_NAME, BELONG, PHONE FROM PUSER_INFO WHERE USER_NO=#{user_no}
